div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1717 Alexandria, 1933 Burial: c. 80 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 40 AE. From tomb at Moustafa Pacha necropolis Ptolemy IX Soter II (as Svoronos 1698, 1702) Disposition: Alexandreia Adriani, AMGR 1933-5 (Alexandreia, 1938), p. 158 (cf. pp. 159, 165, 173 for further coins from same site, incl. Ptolemy IV, VI, IX) REG 1938, p. 183
